name: PracticeIELTSspeakingtest
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: speaking test
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alexa will ask you one random speaking test question from any given topic. This will help you prepare for any challenges during the final speaking test.

Tips to answer the questions;

- Think what to speak
- Try answering the question again if you fumble while speaking
- Take your time to correct yourself
- Record yourself to see how you can improve your answers 

Please note: This skill covers IELTS Speaking test PART 1 - Work, Study & Hometown.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
